attributes.review: This app is SOOO bad. Trump is a terrible orange potato man and he asked for my PHONE NUMBER??? Are you serioussss? I literally am so disgusted that a 70 year old man would ask for the number of a MINOR??? Excuse me??!

attributes.review: so i got the app looking to support my favorite orange man and then the minute i pressed “download” my phone literally exploded. the loud sound made my entire family cry and then they disowned me. so now i am living in a cardboard box but hey at least i have the trump 2020 app.
attributes.title: horrible app, horrible man
